long_description: The men's merino wool/nylon/spandex SmartWool Saturnsphere Socks add comfort to your everyday wardrobe. Made from soft merino wool blended with nylon, these socks wick moisture away from your feet, keeping them warm in the winter. Spandex stretch delivers all-day comfort; supportive arch braces add stability and help keep socks in place. Medium cushioning pads your feet when you're trekking around town. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The men's merino wool/nylon/spandex SmartWool Saturnsphere Socks add comfort to your everyday wardrobe.
